component.name: VacuumTube
component.summary: YouTube TV interface on the desktop

description.p: VacuumTube is an unofficial open source wrapper of YouTube Leanback (the console and Smart TV version of YouTube) for the desktop, with a built-in adblocker and other enhancements. It is the best way to experience the TV interface on your computer, media center, or Steam Deck.
